channel.title: Nofyscape 718/742 || 24/7 || Highscores || Vote4cash || Tons of minigames|| PVM
channel.description:
[i]So i released nofyscape in 1. of June it become preatty popular but due to fact peoples come's from diffrent country's and timezones server player ammount wasn't that high. Why You should check us out and join us?Well becouse i'm always reading forums (you can check forums your own) and adding player's suggested content.I'm always talking with my players and i'm not a duche.[/i]
[center][img]http://oi44.tinypic.com/9j41t1.jpg[/img]Website - [url=http://nofyera.com/ns]Website Home[/url]
[img]http://oi44.tinypic.com/9j41t1.jpg[/img]Forums - [url=http://nofyera.com/f]Forums[/url]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/kjWch.gif[/img]Highscores - [url=http://nofyscape.sytes.net/highscores/]Highscores[/url]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/kjWch.gif[/img]Vote 4 cash - [url=http://nofyscape.sytes.net/vote]Vote 4 cash here![/url]
[img]http://oi40.tinypic.com/70xs2a.jpg[/img]Webclient - [url=http://nofyera.com/ns/webclient]Click here to play![/url]
[img]http://oi40.tinypic.com/70xs2a.jpg[/img]Desktop client download- [url=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/54357615/NofyScape%20Launcher.rar]Click here to download![/url]
[/center]
[center] [b]Features:
1. All skills working (Include Hunter,summoning,construction,dungeoneering(with rewards)) 2. Bosses (KQ,KBD,QBD,Corporal beast,All godwar's bosses,daggnoth king,tornamented deamons,blink(still in development)) 3. Minigames (Fight pits,Fight cave,Fight killin,Clan wars,Dominion tower(speciall rewards shop),Warriors guild,castle wars,barrows,cruicible,troll invasion,Lava flow mine,Pest control) 4. Quests (new quest, Each 3-4 day's) 5. Max and completionist capes 6. Many PVM locations 7. Really friendly staff and owner 8. Lot's of PVP locations 9. Squeal of fortune and you can get spins by crystal chest or by quests 10. Dicing (trusted dicers ingame) or you can create your own application at forums 11. Fully functioned jadinco cave (woodcutting,slayer,firemaking,drops et.c) 12. Clue scrools (300 rewards from them so lot's of fun) 13. HUGE tutorial ingame (Full tutorial on each skill, how to train and best places to train ::skillshelp Ingame command) 14. Bosses are dropping newest drops like (bandos boots,bandos glovwes,bandos warshield et.c et.c) 15. Shops you will find only neccecery items you can get better items from pvm or pvp 16. Working pets (they are cute and sometimes usefull too) 17. Auto donation (auto donation shop) 18. Highscores 19. Daily updates 20. Great economy 21. Loyalty point's and shop 22. Great slayer system 23. Awsome website and forums [/b][hr][/center] [center][b]Media[/b][/center] [center][img]http://nofyera.com/rekl/1.jpg[/img] [img]http://nofyera.com/rekl1/2.jpg[/img] [img]http://nofyera.com/rekl1/3.jpg[/img] [img]http://nofyera.com/rekl1/4.jpg[/img] [img]http://nofyera.com/rekl1/5.jpg[/img] [img]http://nofyera.com/rekl1/6.jpg[/img] [img]http://nofyera.com/rekl1/7.jpg[/img] [img]http://nofyera.com/rekl1/8.jpg[/img] [img]http://nofyera.com/rekl1/9.jpg[/img] [img]http://nofyera.com/rekl1/10.jpg[/img] [img]http://nofyera.com/rekl1/11.jpg[/img] [img]http://nofyera.com/rekl1/12.jpg[/img] [img]http://nofyera.com/rekl1/13.jpg[/img] [img]http://nofyera.com/rekl1/14.jpg[/img] [img]http://nofyera.com/rekl1/15.jpg[/img] [img]http://nofyera.com/rekl1/16.jpg[/img] [img]http://nofyera.com/rekl1/17.jpg[/img] [img]http://nofyera.com/rekl1/18.jpg[/img] [img]http://nofyera.com/rekl1/19.jpg[/img] [img]http://nofyera.com/rekl1/20.jpg[/img] [img]http://nofyera.com/rekl1/21.jpg[/img] [img]http://nofyera.com/rekl1/22.jpg[/img] [img]http://nofyera.com/rekl1/23.jpg[/img] [img]http://nofyera.com/rekl1/24.jpg[/img] [img]http://nofyera.com/rekl1/25.jpg[/img] [img]http://nofyera.com/rekl1/26.jpg[/img] [img]http://nofyera.com/rekl1/27.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][u][b]Few of our videos[/b][/u][/center] [center] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WW1lVsYAMuE[/youtube] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KWhQ2rl6CW8[/youtube] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=u_WBmvs-G3A[/youtube] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yqGjOeW2ar4[/youtube][/center]

item.dc:creator: @latvians latvians
item.description:
@latvians wrote:

So i released nofyscape in 1. of June it become preatty popular but due to fact peoples come’s from diffrent country’s and timezones server player ammount wasn’t that high. Why You should check us out and join us?Well becouse i’m always reading forums (you can check forums your own) and adding player’s suggested content.I’m always talking with my players and i’m not a duche.

[center]Website - Website Home

Forums - Forums

Highscores - Highscores

Vote 4 cash - Vote 4 cash here!

Webclient - Click here to play!

Desktop client download- Click here to download!

[/center]

[center]
[b]Features:

  1. All skills working (Include Hunter,summoning,construction,dungeoneering(with rewards))
  2. Bosses (KQ,KBD,QBD,Corporal beast,All godwar’s bosses,daggnoth king,tornamented deamons,blink(still in development))
  3. Minigames (Fight pits,Fight cave,Fight killin,Clan wars,Dominion tower(speciall rewards shop),Warriors guild,castle wars,barrows,cruicible,troll invasion,Lava flow mine,Pest control)
  4. Quests (new quest, Each 3-4 day’s)
  5. Max and completionist capes
  6. Many PVM locations
  7. Really friendly staff and owner
  8. Lot’s of PVP locations
  9. Squeal of fortune and you can get spins by crystal chest or by quests
  10. Dicing (trusted dicers ingame) or you can create your own application at forums
  11. Fully functioned jadinco cave (woodcutting,slayer,firemaking,drops et.c)
  12. Clue scrools (300 rewards from them so lot’s of fun)
  13. HUGE tutorial ingame (Full tutorial on each skill, how to train and best places to train ::skillshelp Ingame command)
  14. Bosses are dropping newest drops like (bandos boots,bandos glovwes,bandos warshield et.c et.c)
  15. Shops you will find only neccecery items you can get better items from pvm or pvp
  16. Working pets (they are cute and sometimes usefull too)
  17. Auto donation (auto donation shop)
  18. Highscores
  19. Daily updates
  20. Great economy
  21. Loyalty point’s and shop
  22. Great slayer system
  23. Awsome website and forums
    [/b][hr][/center]
